about_the_game:
Exsanguination is a fast-paced, first-person melee combat game where you play as a former vampire hunter now turned into a vampire. Move quickly and masterfully using your grappling hook, and challenge yourself with a speed-run timer for an added layer of excitement.

Will you survive the night or become a victim of the very creatures you once hunted?

Features

Use your newfound vampiric powers to dash, slide, and engage in brutal melee combat against hordes of ghouls and bats. Block enemy attacks, reflect projectiles, and strategically use your wooden stake to heal yourself and finish off foes. Explore a dark, treacherous world filled with traps, secrets, and hidden challenges, including an epic boss battle with the mysterious figure who turned you into a vampire.

Credits

  • Charles Silvennoinen - Product Owner, Environment and Level Design, Art Direction

  • Aapo Vanhainen - Producing, Publishing, Design, Audio, Programming

  • Kimmo Riipinen - Lead Programmer, Audio, QA Lead

  • Emilia Hietikko - Programming, Visual Effects, Design, Scrum Master, Narrative

  • Vili Jalonen - Narrative, Business

  • Jesse Kauhanen - Junior Programmer, Testing

    Special thanks to Sanni Ouli for producing the level music and Severi Boesen for producing the boss fight music for this game.

*This game is a student project created in a period of 9 weeks.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features intense violence, including graphic depictions of enemies exploding with blood and gore, leaving visceral stains on the environment. The sound design emphasizes the brutal nature of combat, with effects that suggest slicing through flesh and violent dismemberment. Some enemy character designs include revealing outfits, with partial nudity.

This content is intended for mature audiences and may not be suitable for all players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
